attributes.action: Recognise fertility treatment at a European Clinic as 'essential travel'
attributes.additional_details: We are asking the UK Government to help fertility patients who need to travel abroad for treatment - this isn't the path we chose but this is our heartbreaking reality. UK and European governments to allow fertility patients to travel with a medical document and negative COVID test within 72 hours of travel. Infertility is a medical condition, that is fact. Patients undergoing treatment for such should be allowed to travel for medical reasons and it should be classed as essential travel.
attributes.background: Patients treating infertility, a confirmed medical condition, their treatment clinic can reside in Europe due to the condition being treated ie/ egg donation, sperm donation. We want the government to deem travel for fertility treatment as 'essential travel', the same as other medical conditions.
